name: Roy Holifield
text: Everyone is so nice and attentive! Makes going to the doctor not so bad! I wish I would have started coming here a long time ago!

resp.text: Thank you very much Roy! We are glad to be caring for you, thank you for your review.

name: Regina League
text: Everyone was extremely friendly and caring. Especially Terri who helped me check in while I was  limping. I waited less than 5 minutes in the lobby and patient room. I was referred to a neighboring facility for an X-ray, and received the results within a couple hours via text message that included instructions for my treatment.  The staff and facility far exceeded my expectations.

resp.text: Regina, thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience online. We especially appreciate your comments with respect to Terry, who has recently taken over coordinating our guest experiences in the reception area.  We will share your feedback with the team in our team meeting today, thank you for partnering with Innova for your health, we hope you are feeling better and that you have a wonderful Thanksgiving!

name: karen doran
text: I Always get in on time for appointments and they are great at getting me in if I need an appointment on the fly. I feel like I’ve been listened to and trust Dr Uptagraft and her staff!

resp.text: That is wonderful to hear, we strive to serve our patients in trusted relationships responsively and efficiently. Thank you for entrusting your care to us and taking the time to share your kind words.

name: Sandy Moore
text: This was my first visit, for a Medicare annual physical. I interacted with four different medical personnel, each of whom was friendly, courteous and efficient. My physician, Dr Diaz, explained the purpose if my visit, and listened patiently as I described what I needed from the visit.  I received complete results of my visit on the patient portal, within two days, including Dr Diaz's recommendations for me, and along with her invitation to me to make the final decisions. I felt respected and that Innova personnel were partners with me in my  care.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with our team at Innova Sandy! We are honored to be in partnership with you in caring for your health and we strive to treat our guests as we would want to be treated.

name: Anna Perry
text: I am so happy to have found Innova primary care, everyone is very professional and kind!

resp.text: We are happy you found us! It is our goal to go above and beyond, thank you for entrusting your care to our team and for taking the time to leave your encouraging words.

name: Barbara Hitt
text: I have only had one appointment at Innova Primary Care. My doctor retired so I have been reading reviews and talking with friends about finding a new doctor. I had my New Patient visit this morning, and I couldn’t be more pleased with Dr. Kelly Diaz and the facility. We had a nice discussion of my medical history, current needs, expectations, etc.; and I think she will be excellent to work with. I told her that she is exactly what I was hoping to find in a new doctor - a bright young woman.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback Barbara and for entrusting your care to our team at Innova!

name: Michelle Ashmore
text: Allison is amazing! She really listens to your concerns and takes them into consideration as she moves forward with her decisions on your treatment options. She is very knowledgeable and is eager to help you in any way she can. Not only am I patient, but I also work in the medical field and I know how valuable that is to find!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments Michelle and for allowing us to care for you! We are thankful to have Allison as a part of our team here at Innova.

name: Lee Burkett
text: Very professional and caring

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback and for entrusting your care to our team!

name: Yamilet Ayala
text: Everyone there is incredibly patient, understanding, kind, and accommodating to circumstances. They will thoroughly explain anything and everything to you. Dr. Uptagraft specifically is a very loving and concerned doctor as well as person. The new patient process is pleasantly quick and once at the office, you will promptly be called to the room. You will receive excellent care!

resp.text: Thank you Yamilet for your 5 star review and for taking your time to leave your comments!

name: Michelle Ashmore
text: Allison is amazing! She really listens to your concerns and takes them into consideration as she moves forward with her decisions on your treatment options. She is very knowledgeable and is eager to help you in any way she can. Not only am I patient, but I also work in the medical field and I know how valuable that is to find!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments Michelle and for allowing us to care for you! We are thankful to have Allison as a part of our team here at Innova.

name: Rachel Stone
text: All of the staff members are friendly and professional. I’ve never had to wait too long to see the doctor. The space is modern and clean. My favorite thing is that I can communicate with the office over text or in my patient portal. It makes everything so much easier. Highly recommend!

resp.text: The whole Innova team appreciates your comments, thank you so much for leaving your feedback Rachel!

name: Cassie Taylor
text:
Today was my first visit as a new patient with Dr. Uptagrafft and Allison, the nurse practitioner. I rarely leave reviews, but I was impressed with the entire group.

Allison was thorough and thoughtful. I felt like she was truly listening to my concerns to help decide together which course of action is best for me and my health.

I’ll definitely be returning and recommending. Everyone was extremely friendly, which is a plus because doctor’s offices can be scary for some.

resp.text: Cassie, thank you allowing us to care for you and for taking the time to leave your positive feedback! Our team loves to hear reviews like yours!

name: Dian Huff
text: First time I walkEd into Innova I felt very comfortable. Staff is very nice and professional. Looking forward to a great relationship with the Innova group for years to come.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and for partnering with us for your health!

name: Kira Broadwater
text: Very helpful. A little heavy on the tech usage; I personally prefer checking in one on one with a person rather than a computer. The receptionist was very friendly and helpful though. For those who love technology, this is definitely top notch. The PA was amazing, very friendly, down to earth, and a good listener.

resp.text: Thanks for leaving your feedback Kira and for allowing our team at Innova to care for you. We do utilize technology extensively to improve patient privacy and efficiency in the clinic. While we generally have a receptionist to assist guests with check-in at reception, this is not always the case when we are running with a minimal staff or sick team members. We would welcome any feedback you have if there is something you would suggest we do differently during the new patient application process to help our new guests be more comfortable with our check-in and electronic communication processes.

name: David Combs
text: After being a very happy patient for 2 years of them seeming to be a caring group that didn't want you to go to a doc in the box and was concerned enough to be open on Saturdays now they announce they will require a monthly fee to be a patient. Too many good doctors in Huntsville.

resp.text:
Mr. Combs,

We are sorry that you had a negative experience during the process to continue as a patient at Innova after your provider retired as a primary care giver.

As you mentioned, we do have a service that provides our patients the ability to message their providers and access their medical records online through the portal app for their phone. Many people feel that this convenience and ease of communication with their Primary Care Clinic is valuable, but we also understand that we are not a good fit for everyone.

We wish you well in finding a primary care clinic that you can form a trusted relationship with.

name: Art Davis
text: My first trip as a new patient, but very impressed. The staff was extremely friendly but focused on getting my medical history information correct. Seemed to be a very efficient operation with everyone knowing their job and doing it without any loose motion. I was called back ten minutes ahead of my appointment time. So far, so good!

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to leave a review, we especially appreciate your comments on efficiency! While patients' introduce challenges that an engine manufacturing plant never will, we strive to incorporate the most efficient methods to give our patients' the best experience possible at Innova. When we designed our facility and operational processes, we utilized the UAH LEAN OOE design team to assist our management team. UAH has great depth of experience in assisting NASA, Toyota, Polaris, etc - those best practices from our hi-tech city are brought to bear for the good of our patient guests at Innova!

You can read more about our work with UAH OOE here:

https://www.uah.edu/ooe/news/12158-uah-ooe-celebrates-innova-primary-care-s-ribbon-cutting

name: Lynn Rudow
text: I've been a patient for about 15 years, when Dr. Uptagrafft came to Huntsville.   She has continually worked to be the best doctor she can be.  She, and now her staff, actually listen And allow you to be a part of your treatment.  Her new practice it wonderful!  I love being able to get the medical attention quickly, sometimes the same day.  Friendly staff,  love how they share pictures in the exam room of family, and fantastic wall decor!

resp.text: Thank you Lynn, we believe trusted relationships are critical to being able to care for our guests and we appreciate you taking the time to leave your feedback.

name: Lacey Gilliam
text: What a great experience! Each staff member was friendly and positive. The facility was beautiful and I love the easy to access patient portal. If you’re looking for top quality, this is it!

resp.text: Thank you Lacey for allowing our team to care for you and for your positive feedback!

name: Hope Davis
text: Absolutely loved everything about this practice! The cleanliness of the office and the care and attention to detail from everyone I spoke with was impressive. It was so easy to complete all the necessary forms online and the check in process was very quick and easy. My wait time was short and I feel the nurse (Allison) and Dr. Uptagrafft really listened to my symptoms and questions and concerns. Everyone was very friendly and thorough!

resp.text: Thank you Hope & welcome to Innova, thank you for partnering with us for your health!

name: Christina Nichole
text: Allison really listened and cared about what I had to say. Their office is all super kind and professional and everything runs seamlessly. Amazing.

resp.text: Thank you Christina, we strive to be exceptional and our team is greatly encouraged by partnerships with patients like you that recognize our emphasis on caring for our guests and continual improvement! Thank you for allowing us to serve you.

name: Victoria Aycock
text: My husband and I both use Innova Primary Care and NP Kelly and could not be happier with the quality of care we have received. They are unbelively efficient. They schedule appointments quickly and we never have to wait. Also Kelly is super kind and thorough. She is very good at her job. Dr. Brooke goes out of her way to meet all the patients which is really nice.

resp.text: Thank you Victoria! We read your feedback in our lunch huddle yesterday and the entire team appreciated it, thank you for allowing us to serve your family.

name: K Hudlin
text: I had an absolutely wonderful experience at Innova Primary Care! Mrs. Amy Pittman was outstanding, she answered all of my questions and concerns in regards to the Hospitals in the area, different OBGYNs, and the different care services that Innova Primary Care provides. She made me feel so welcome and comfortable with her. I am too excited to have her as someone I can talk to and receive medical care from. The whole staff was amazing, even though I had to bring my two babies to my appointment, due to my daycare closing for a holiday. Everyone I came in contact with spoke very kindly and warmly to my children and I! No one made me feel bad or uncomfortable for having a 1 and 2 year old with me. I can't say enough how happy I am. If you're looking for great medical care and genuine people, this has to be your first choice!

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. Thank you for allowing us to serve you!

name: Becky Marshall
text: Very warm welcome as a new patient! The professionalism of all staff was awesome.

resp.text: Becky, thank you for taking the time to share your experience online. We strive to be warm and welcoming while also utilizing technology effectively to care for our guests. We will share your comments with the team in our team meeting today! We hope you have a wonderful Thanksgiving.

name: Sunny Booher
text: The staff at Innova is great! They are all very knowledgeable, always super friendly & very eager to help! I moved to the area a few months ago, and I'm grateful to have found such a well informed & well rounded Primary Care facility.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback, and welcome to Huntsville!

name: Susan Nymeyer
text: Kelly is amazing. She was careful to not over-prescribe and she listened to me with regard to what I have come to know about my own body. She had some non-pharmaceutical suggestions to try, but also prescribed for a different issue. I came away with a very positive feeling.

resp.text: Thank you Susan, we are all happy Kelly is a part of the Innova team. We also appreciate guests like you that realize that pills are not necessarily the best fix for their problems! Thank you for allowing us to care for you.

name: Tess McKaig
text: Innova Primary Care is not only the top in Primary Care treatment. They are also up to date in all the latest technology. Their staff is friendly and helpful. My medical treatment by my Nurse Practitioners is like none other. I feel right at ease with my provider. I know she has my best interest in my healthcare.  I would recommend Innova Primary Care to all my friends and family. Thank you for making me feel special.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us!  We have a wonderful team of healthcare providers and are pleased to hear about the exceptional care you have received from our nurse practitioners!  We look forward to continuing to serve you in the future!

name: Amy Stephens
text: My husband referred me to Innova. In fact, he all but insisted he is so happy there. I saw Angie. Everything was great. It's clean and everyone is very friendly and efficient! I'm an Infection Control nurse. Before anyone knew that, everyone washed their hands before and after seeing me. You may think this happens everywhere, but I can tell you it doesn't. Angie was kind and smart. I feel very good about my decision to change doctors. Thank you for having such high standards!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amy! We read your review Monday in our team huddle and our clinical manager really appreciates you recognizing and encouraging her staff. We stress proper hand hygiene, you may have noticed the clean hands campaign signs in our guest rooms. Thank you for your work in infection control to address this ongoing challenge in healthcare.

name: A B
text: Just had my new patient visit with Innova, and my first impression of the office atmosphere, the staff, & the doctor is that they are very organized, helpful, and friendly.  The doctor that I saw today was very pleasant, and the first thing she did was introduce herself and give me her background experience information.  I feel like the staff at Innova will be a good fit for any future medical needs that I may have.

resp.text: Welcome to Innova! Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback and for allowing us to care for you.

name: Shauna Traylor (Smile_Shauna)
text: I had left a positive review previously but am now retracting. When I first came to this office this process of actually getting in was slightly ridiculous. You can not simply call and speak with a human being to make an appointment. You are required to download an app and “apply” for an appointment. I had to schedule a yearly physical 4 months out from my original appointment to be able to get in on a (their) specific time/day/doctor schedule. Then I received a phone call that I was required to move my appointment ANOTHER 4 months out to, again, be able to get in at a time pretty much convenient for them. I’m also not crazy about that fact that when you finally get an appointment, it’s with whatever doctor is available. I prefer to have the same doctor every time.  I really wanted to like coming here because Brooke Uptagraft is a very sweet person and I would have loved to have her as my primary doctor.  However it is not worth all of the hoops required to jump through. I will be choosing another office.

resp.text: Hi Shauna, we are sorry you have had trouble with our appointment scheduling system. Our team would have been happy to work with you to find a time that worked better for you and we apologize for the inconvenience in rescheduling for you. It works great for our patients to communicate to us through the patient portal any specific scheduling needs and we do our best to accommodate them. Send us a portal message if you'd like us to provide you appointment options, otherwise we wish you the best with your new physician.

name: Mikey P
text: I was looking to get established with a new primary care physician when I made an appointment at Innova Primary Care.  It couldn't have been easier to set everything up.  I went online and submitted everything electronically via their web site (I ALWAYS forget to bring forms with me to these things).  I am amazed at how quick and easy it was!  The web site is super fast and easy to use, which is rare nowadays when it comes to anything medical.  I was able to get an appointment with Kelley Rogers.  She was very polite, professional, and easy to talk to about my medical history and goals.  It is clear that this isn't an office that pushes/forces you to do anything you aren't comfortable with (i.e. setting unrealistic goals, ordering needless tests, etc).  I got a Saturday appointment, which is great for my schedule!  When I got to the office for the first time, I walked in the door, sat down, and less than 1 minute later I was already in a room.  Oh and that wait time in the room for Kelley?  Less than 5 minutes!  I mean, my appointment was at 10:45AM on a Saturday and I was already in a room and being seen at 10:40 (I got there at about 10:35)!!  Since the web site was super easy to use, they didn't ask me a bunch of redundant questions and it really streamlined the check-in process and made everything stress-free!!  I highly recommend Innova to anyone looking for a new practice!!

resp.text: Mikey, thank you for your review and for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to be caring for you!

name: Eric St. John
text: I first met Dr. Brooke and her husband David outside of their office. I was very impressed with their forward thinking, modern views of the medical industry and their drive to be adaptable to the continuous changes we see in this industry. After experiencing a patient visit at Innova Primary Care, I am pleased to say my experience with the rest of the staff was just as good. No question as to why they received the award for medical practice of the year in Huntsville through the Chamber of Commerce. Congrats to the whole team on this. I highly recommend them for your primary care needs.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Eric!  We appreciate your feedback and for taking the time to share about your experience at Innova!

name: Matthew McSavaney
text: BEWARE: onboarding process for new patients is a nightmare, the onboarding agent was rude and condescending when I asked why I was being charged with hidden and unnecessary fees. Whenever I asked questions about hidden fees and long wait times to get in the system (3 months), she just kept saying “we understand we’re not best suited for everyone” and wouldn’t give me a straight answer.  So frustrating, I may as well have been talking to a robot. You have to pay $60 dollars a year for an online service (that you don’t have to use, because you can still just call if you prefer) and if you opt out of the unnecessary online service then they charge you $10 for every piece of mail they would send you. Ridiculous and unnecessary. I suspect they have too many clients because they don’t do a good job of making new clients feel welcome and taken care of. The CRNP I saw was good, but there are too many layers of unnecessary headache between the client and her. I chose this place because it came highly recommended to me by family, but apparently that was years ago before the new onboarding and client management process, and when I asked why this new process was so terrible, she said it didn’t use to be that way. I was told that my family member was probably “grandfathered” in to the old system. If the new client management system was truly better, easier, more intuitive, and actually added value for older customers, then why would they not institute it with all their clients? This suggests to me that they care more about squeezing money out of clients rather than adding value for them. New clients should avoid.

resp.text: Matt, we will miss you at Innova.  We apologize that you did not feel welcomed and taken care of as that is certainly not our intention.  Part of what makes us what we are at Innova is our embracing of new technology and providing responsive care to guests with whom we can partner together for health through trusted relationships.  We regret we were unable to develop that relationship with you.  Although our on-boarding process involves multiple steps, we find it helps us clearly inform our patients up front of who we are, what services we provide and ensure that matches with the type of primary care home they are looking for.  We have learned we are unable to partner with our guests who do not value the services we are providing which results in them not receiving the healthcare they deserve. We wish you all the best as you establish with a new primary care home.

name: Kerry Goens
text:
Angie Hart is phenomenal!
Kind, caring & professional - exactly what you want in your doctor's office.
I am very thankful for her, Dr. Brooke & Innova!
Merry Christmas & Happy 2019

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Our team is encouraged by your warm wishes and we wish the same for you in 2019!

name: Sissy Spence
text: Always a kind, friendly and caring staff.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review and for the entrusting our team with the privilege of caring for you!

name: Karyn Spicer
text: The office is very nice and welcoming. The nurse at the front desk was helpful and quick, but NOT pushy.  She made an effort to engage in conversation with each person coming in. I sat down for maybe 5 minutes, after completing my check-in, before I was called back.  The nurses that took initial information were very nice and personable.  Then the Dr came right in.  He was great! He came in, did what he needed to, asked the questions he needed to and then we were finished.  That's just how I like it.  I was in and out in less than an hour from the time I stepped in the door.  It was wonderful.  The office has great hours, even on Saturday! Hopefully I continue to be healthy, but in case I don't- I'm very happy to know this office has my back.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5 star review Karyn, our team appreciates your positive words. We strive to treat our guests as we would want to be treated.

name: Nathan Olson
text: Innova Primary Care is incredibly helpful and accessible. When I have had questions about my medications or appointments they are always willing to accommodate and explain what needs to be done. They are also very friendly.

resp.text: Thank you very much Nathan, we strive to serve as we would want to be served.

name: Todd Aycock
text: Very well organized, clean, good doctors and nurse practitioners!  Regularly see Kelley and Dr. Brooke and they are both awesome!

resp.text: Thank you, Todd, for the 5 star review and for your comments!

name: Katie Bowers
text: The practice seems large however you would never know it. It runs very efficiently. Wait time has never been an issue and they have a "sick" and "well" waiting rooms.  That meant a lot this winter when I needed a well visit but the flu was everywhere. Kelly, the NP I see, knows my healthy history before coming in the room. She always spends as much time with me as needed but I have never had to wait long to see her. She is very professional and has wonderful bedside manner.  I haven't been a patient long however I wish I had made the change earlier! Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Katie! As you mentioned, during the winter flu/sick season we maintain separate lobby wings for the benefit of our guests. With flu season winding down, you may find on your next visit a group health class or other activities occurring in the South wing. Our receptionist diligently monitors and sanitizes the lobby and kiosks year round, so we hope our sick area won't be missed during the Summer. Thank you again for your comments and for allowing us to care for you.

name: Jennifer McCain
text: I love the easy atmosphere of this practice!! Clean, caring, efficient, calm...always a pleasant experience whether a sick visit or a well visit.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback!

name: Andrew Morris
text: The level of service and professionalism with Innova is beyond anything I have experienced in the medical field before.

resp.text: Thank you for allowing our team to care for you and for taking the time to leave a review! You made our day!

name: Kelley Jensen
text: This place only cares about money. Not their patients.

resp.text: Hi Kelley, we are sorry to hear you feel that way. If you have been billed beyond what your health insurance company indicated, please contact our billing department and we will be happy to refund any credit you may have or straighten it out for you. If there's nothing we can do to assist you, we hope it helped you in some way to leave a one star review on Google for our team here at Innova.

name: Lisa Bates
text: I have been dreading having to find a new doctor. I found Innova on line and like the approach they take. Everyone was super nice. Kelley Rogers was very professional and caring. Took time to get to know me. Not just rush in and out like so many doctors do. I think I found a good fit for my healthcare needs.

resp.text: Thank you for your review Lisa and for letting us serve you here at Innova.

name: Cynthia G.
text: Great clinic with wonderful doctors and certified nurse practitioners. Would highly recommend this medical practice to anyone.  Rarely wait longer than 5 min for them to call you back to a room. Staff is very efficient and cordial as well. Just realized they also have hours available on Saturday also.  And an app to make appts and refills in medicine very handy. 5 stars!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review!  We are pleased to hear about your postive experience with our office as well as our patient portal!

name: Melissa Hutchens
text: Today was our first time here (Me & My Husband Robert) We both really liked it  So Glad we chose  the Innova Primary Care ... they are the Sweetest.. I feel like they really care for there patience...  and want to do what ever it takes to fix the problem...

resp.text: Thank you Melissa! We do care about you and we strive to do our best for our guests, welcome to Innova.

name: Elise Stokes
text: Super friendly and caring staff! I always feel like my time is important and that I’m being listened to. Check in process is very easy, always a short wait time, and the lobby is very nice and inviting.

resp.text: Thank you Elise, that is exactly what we are striving for! Occasionally, when a clinic day is behind schedule, it is likely because someone very ill has come to us for care, please know that we still respect and value you. Thank you for allowing us to care for you!

name: Gina Meeks
text: The wait time was minimal.  The facility is beautiful.  The staff is very friendly!  The nurse practitioner was great!  She was very knowledgable, caring and accommodating!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Gina!

name: Barry Fisher
text: I had my first experience as a new patient at Innova and I was very impressed. NP Kelly and her intern were both great. The staff is very friendly and the entire process was very efficient.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback! Kelley does a great job caring for our guests and training new providers.

name: Jessica Perez
text: I recently had a physical there and it was my first time in the new building. I just love how big the rooms are and how modern everything is. The staff is wonderful and will take their time with you. I do not feel rushed. We do not need to go to a walk in clinic if someone is sick on a Saturday because they are open!! I love that! I also love that I can login to my patient portal to request a refill and schedule an appointment along with viewing records of my visits. This is a great medical practice!!

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback Jessica, we always like to hear from our guests that appreciate the convenience of technology! Thank you for allowing us to serve you.

name: David Weich
text:
This was my first to Innova Primary Care. Before I get to the visit, Cindy Phillips, assisted me with registration on the telephone to ensure that I made it through all of the “wickets” so that I could get my initial appointment with a doctor. Cindy was professional, courteous, and patient as I stumbled through the internet process.
When I arrived at the office I checked in at the kiosk on an iPad. It was fairly easy. I had some trouble centering up my photograph when taking my own picture and a young woman working in the front office who was watching me came out and assisted me right away.
In just a few moments I was taken back to the exam room for the preliminary  vital signs. After just a few more minutes Dr. Diaz came in. Dr. Diaz had plenty of time for me and was not rushed at all. I thought this was very nice because I was meeting her for the first time. She addressed all of my concerns and had a concise plan for each.  I felt like Dr. Diaz listened to what I was saying and looked at me rather than looking at a computer screen and typing like many doctors do.
My overall experience at Innova Primary Care was excellent! Everyone I encountered was professional, friendly, and efficient. I feel lucky to have found them.

resp.text: David, your words mean so much to the hard working team here, thank you for taking the time to share your comments and leave a review.

name: Humble Beginnings
text: I love everything about this facility. The receptionist is very sweet & helpful. The waiting area has a modern look but still has a warm welcoming feel to it. Angelia Hart is my doctor and I honestly made a great choice when I decided to stick with her as my doctor.

resp.text: Thank you! We are glad to be caring for you.

name: Adam Haines
text: This place is not about patient care.  After spending $300 for someone to check my weight, take my temperature and order blood work, I go back to find out they don't take Cigna insurance (New job, I can't control their insurance)   Yes, it's on Cinga's website they are "in Network", but according to the woman in glass box upfront, it's only for certain patients.  Apparently, I'm not important enough to be one of those patients.  Again this place is obviously not about patient care only about money.    They took my cash very quick but not my insurance card.

resp.text: Hi Adam, we regret your negative experience at Innova and thank you for your time in discussing further with us by email. We have requested that Cigna have us removed as accepting new patients from their website and we apologize that they are providing incorrect information about our clinic. On our website, in the new patient registration section, we do maintain an up to date list of the insurances we are currently accepting. We have also refunded the payment amount you requested following our email exchange. Please let us know if we can do anything further to resolve your complaint.

name: Carly Fennell
text: Knowledgeable and friendly staff who truly go out of their way to help their clients!

resp.text: Thank you Carly!

name: Julia Olson
text: I hate going to the dr.  I hate that you sit forever because they are never on schedule.  I also really dislike that many dr offices still fax.  Guess what?  Innova has it going on.  I walked in, signed in on a tablet (hello technology), and was immediately called.  In the room, I waited 4 minutes for the dr.  She had a conversation with me and we agreed on a plan.  Everything I needed in terms of lab work can be done right there.  And I really love the tv screen in each room with pictures of the dr I was going to see in a slideshow format.  Innova has brought excellence in primary care into a very clean, professional tone and I am happy to recommend!!!

resp.text: Julia, your review made our day! We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and we will share your review with the whole team today during our staff meeting. We are always working for continual improvement at Innova and it is encouraging to hear that you share our frustration with the widespread dependence on unreliable communication methods like fax machines and telephone calls to transfer critical patient information between medical facilities in our community. We strive to avoid paper orders and utilizing faxes, but because so few clinics and hospital facilities locally utilize modern communication methods, we are still forced to send 86% of our communications with other clinics by "electronic fax." This just means that we don't use paper to send the fax, but it's still a picture of a document sent over a phone line as opposed to electronic communication with structured data in a standardized format that increases accuracy and safety. Thank you for being an advocate for improving patient safety and spreading awareness in the Rocket City that the state of Healthcare IT is embarrassingly behind. Thank you also for partnering with the team at Innova for your health, we are thankful for you and wish you a wonderful Thanksgiving.

name: Carl Higgins
text:
I am a relatively new patient here. I have to say, they make everything easy. The have automated a lot of their administrative processes and use technology to their advantage (e.g. having a patient web portal where you can communicate with them, see test results, schedule appointments, etc). The result is that it frees the providers up to focus on the patient rather than paperwork. And their appointment times run like clockwork. Like a 9am appointment is really 9am, and if they are 10 minutes late, they are apologizing profusely.

Every provider I have dealt with at Innova also gets an "A" for bedside manner. Sometimes medical issues aren't easy to discuss, even with medical professionals. However, Innova providers really have a warm interpersonal, friendly demeanor that takes that edge off.

They also focus on general wellness and health as much as medicine, that is they don't just throw pills at you. They actually have a full time dietician/nutritionist and a wellness program you can enroll in. So if you are looking to lose weight or just not be a generally average unhealthy Alabamian, it's better to do it under medical supervision from people who know what they are doing.

Also, they take my insurance (Aetna), and their rates/discounts are reasonable, so that's nice too. And they are like a half mile from my house. A+!

resp.text: Wow Carl, thank you for your review and for taking the time to leave your positive comments! Our whole team will be encouraged to read what you've shared, we appreciate you.

name: Charlsie Porter
text: The staff is very kind and helpful. They also use patient portal that is very easy and convenient to use. I highly recommend Innova.

resp.text: Thank you Charlsie! Your comments will be shared with the team, thank you for taking the time to leave feedback.

name: Jonah Reeves
text: Staff is always friendly, informative, and knowledgeable in answering any questions. Waiting time before appointments is very short and the service has been excellent!

resp.text: Thank you, Jonah, for allowing our team to serve you and for taking the time to leave your feedback!

name: Harold Renneberg iii
text: The staff is professional courteous and personable. I feel they truly care about their patients well being

resp.text: Thank you for your review Harold and for allowing us to serve you.

name: Roxanne Tucker
text: Beautiful,  state of the art facilities!! From the time you walk in the door until the moment you walk out, you are made to feel welcome. The staff goes out of their way to accommodate your needs. I have been here on 4 occasions and the time I spent with Amy far surpassed my wait time. They are very prompt and professional. I love Amy and am pleased with the  time , care and concern she has for me and my daughters. Also , a huge plus ladies , they actually have a cotton robe for you to wear. Not the usual thin paper gowns. This place has thought of everything , with the patient in mind. Thanks Innova!!

resp.text: Our goal is to provide high quality, patient-centered care to each of our patients at every visit.  We are pleased to hear about your positive experiences at Innova appreciate your feedback!

name: Ashlee Eastham
text: I was looking for a primary physician and they were recommended by a few women in the local mom group I am a part of. I had my first appointment today with Dr. Hart. It was a great experience. I got into a room almost immediately upon arriving and a nurse came to talk to me and do vitals pretty much right after. The doctor was right on time and took her time talking to me. She listened to my concerns and took me seriously. She was very nice. The doctors office is the nicest I've ever seen as well and everyone who was working was nice and helpful. I would RECCOMEND them highly!

resp.text: Thank you for your comments Ashlee, we strive to show that we respect and value every guest that we care for in our clinic, thank you for letting us care for you.

name: Susan Conner
text:
I felt so loved and genuinely cared for at Innova Care with their staff.

I am so happy to have a primary care home.

resp.text: Thank you for trusting our team to care for you Susan, we strive to treat our guests as we would want to be treated!

name: Heather Conley
text: Innova creates an experience for patients like no other doctor I have been to. Great virtual presence allows you to access your files and send your doctor messages with ease. Everyone is very friendly and Kelley Rogers is amazing, thorough, and relatable! I have never waited longer than 10 minutes to be taken back to be seen. I can't recommend Innova enough!

resp.text: Heather, thank you for your review! We have found that technology allows us to engage more effectively with our patients and to run a more efficient office. If you haven't already, be sure to download the Healow app for your phone. It provides the functionality of the patient portal all on your smartphone. Thank you for choosing Innova to care for you.

name: Meagan Rodriguez
text: Innova primary care is one of the best doctors I've ever been to. I would definitely recommend them to everyone. They are very understanding and they take their time to listen to you and re assure you no matter what the worries are. They are great.

resp.text: Thanks Meagan!

name: Scott Nicol
text:
Getting used to the electronic sign-in, but afterwards it was a good experience. Did not have to wait long for my appt. They treated me like family—like I’d been there a bunch of times even though this was my first visit. I heartily recommend Dr. Diaz. She was amazingly caring—like a sister or daughter.
Wonderful visit.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5 star review Scott! Dr Diaz is wonderful, please let us know if you have suggestions on how we can streamline our check-in process.

name: Grace Lane
text: When I walked into the office I thought I was walking into the greeting room of a spa lol it's very nice and welcoming. The staff and doctors are AMAZING. Did not feel rushed AT ALL and I was listened to and cared for like you should be at a doctor office. I would highly recommend this place to anyone.

resp.text: Grace, thank you for your review and spa comment! Studies have shown that blood pressure rises measurably for people going to the doctor's office and we were deliberate in the design of this facility to try to create a calming and welcoming environment. Spas were indeed our inspiration, although our team members were nearly felling asleep when we played spa music, so we had to change the music to something more lively! Thank you for allowing us to care for you.

name: Scott Hill
text: Organized and patient focused. Great experience.

resp.text: Thank you Scott, we appreciate you partnering with our team for your health and your support of Innova by leaving a review!

name: Kari Kasumi
text: Everyone is really nice and friendly. I am always back to my room within five minutes  and Dr. Uptagrafft won a small business award for her clinic. She's really nice too. They are very technologically forward with their equipment and the building itself. They have a website and app where you can sign in and make appointments and view your blood work results, medical history, and update any info you need to. I love this place and I'm so glad I found them to be my primary care physicians. :)

resp.text: Thank you, Kari! We apprerciate your positive feedback and look forward to continuing to serve you in the future!

name: Amy Holt
text: This doctors office is top notch. All of the employees are so kind and caring. The office is very welcoming when you first enter and it’s super easy to get checked in. The best thing is this is the cleanest office I’ve ever been in. I would recommend this office to everyone!

resp.text: Thanks Amy, we think you're top notch too!

name: Sylvia Romero
text: INNOVA Primary Care is an amazing health facility. From the moment I entered, to the time I walked out,  I was well taken care of by the entire staff. I especially appreciate the patient portal where I have communicated several times with questions about my visit to the staff and answered promptly. This is one of the most professional doctor's office I have ever visited. This is definitely my "forever" doctor facility.

resp.text: Thank you for your positive review and feedback!  We are glad you enjoy using your patient portal, it is one of the best ways to communicate with our office!

name: Keith Parker
text: This is the best experience I've ever had at a doctor's office. They are efficient, organized, use the latest technology, plus they are friendly and, most importantly of all, they listen to you... they know that treatment means more than just the symptoms at hand but, rather, treatment of your whole body. Superb medical practice.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us!  We look forward to continuing to serve you in the future!

name: Tony Prestis
text:
Shady …Tried to become a new patient, but before you even set foot in the door they are nickel and diming you.

$2.99 a month for a Netflix style subscription service to get “benefits” like seeing the Dr. when your sick and sending you test results. I was offered a new patient appointment the next day with the service so they must have had openings. But when I declined my appointment was pushed out 3 months. When I was instead offered “paper communications” where they will mail you things but charge you for each thing but don’t really tell you how often that is. Obviously a attempt to push people to the subscription as that was being hard pressured to me.

I did not want to sign until I got to the office and ask how often “paper communications” were, but after 2 months of harassing calls and emails on the subject they canceled my appointment. (after wasting 2 months of my time)

They may have the best Dr’s in Huntsville but if you can’t get past the paper work as a service style subscription it does not matter. I would recommend finding an office better suited for your needs.

resp.text:
Mr. Prestis,

We are sorry that you had a negative experience during the pre-registration process to become a patient at Innova.

We do offer “Same Day/Sick Visit” appointments once our patients are enrolled at Innova, these appointments are shorter and we have many of them as opposed to our longer visits for "Annual Physicals" or "New Patient Encounters" where we thoroughly review the patient’s medical history. This is why we were able to offer you a “Sick Visit” immediately, but we couldn’t schedule you for your “New Patient Encounter” for several months. Typically, the wait wouldn’t be so long even for a “New Patient Encounter,” but we experienced higher than expected new patient registrations when we resumed accepting and as a result we have since stopped accepting new patients.

As you mentioned, we do have an option for our patients to message their providers and access their medical records online through the portal app for their phone. Many people feel that this convenience and ease of communication with their Primary Care Clinic is valuable, but we also understand that we are not a good fit for everyone.

We strive to effectively serve our community and we regret that we were unable to establish a relationship with you. We wish you well in finding a primary care clinic that you can form a trusted relationship with.

name: Julia Rushing
text: Amy Pittman is FANTASTIC. She is thorough, listens to your concerns, and is always willing to answer any questions either during your visit or over the portal. She doesn't try to rush through your visits, either and has a demeanor that will put you at ease. I used a different doctor at the practice for my last physical and there was a mixup on my labs at Innova, and I suspected it had to do with duplicate labs being pulled both fasted and unfasted, which made some of my numbers look awful. I messaged Amy, and she responded quickly over the portal and made notes in my records about the error and eased my concerns. Anytime I have messaged with a question, I have received a prompt answer, almost always the same day. When I've had questions about medications I am prescribed, she answers in a really easy to understand way without "dumbing it down" or being condescending.

name: Diedre Davis
text: I have not previously had issues with Innova until the recent months. These are my reasons behind that. I don’t like coming into a doctor’s office and not be greeted by a friendly face. Instead you’re greeted by a keyosk (however you spell it) walking you through steps to sign in and pay. Next when you are seen, the visits are rushed and I feel that I’m just a number patient on the list,  instead of a person who they are taking their time with to answer any questions or concerns I may have. I have left several times knowing that I did not get the opportunity to address all of my concerns. While I know this is a business, and money has to be exchanged for services, If you are behind on a payment of $10 or whatever, I don’t appreciate being called by a “mafia like” voice message indicating I have 24 hours to pay you, and that I cannot be seen until that is resolved. Lastly, my father was recently scheduled for a procedure. However,  his blood pressure was too high. Stroke level to be exact. Innova was called and they refused to see him at their office even when the nurse where he was called them, hoping that would make a difference.  They claimed there is a balance on his account, which there isn’t. This is very poor judgement on a so called health care professional. Copies of the canceled checks have been shown indicating he was up to date, but they just dropped him as a patient.  I along with the rest family have “DROPPED “ Innova as our primary health care facility. Anyone looking for a general practitioner, should never go here. Thanks.

resp.text:
Diedre, We hope you are able to establish with a new provider with which you have a trusting provider-patient relationship. While we cannot discuss patient cases on a public form as you have brought up, I have certainly enjoyed talking to your father myself several times over the past few weeks and was happy to take care of his medical needs. We look forward to seeing him again soon. Medical billing can be a frustrating and confusing issue especially in this time of increasing deductibles.  We deal with this on behalf of our patients frequently and are happy to discuss these questions or concerns with our patients to get them resolved.

Our current practices at Innova include being open on Saturdays for sick visits and for those who work during the week as a convenience to them.  We do not fully staff the office on Saturdays so you will not see one of my team sitting at the guest reception desk in the lobby. My team needs their weekends too! Otherwise, Christine or one of my other team members is at the guest reception desk to greet you.  I regret you have not felt heard at your office visits.  This is one of our highest priorities at Innova.  We sometimes find that we cannot adequately address all of a patient’s concerns within one office visit and in those instances we will ask you to continue to follow up with us until all has been addressed. Lastly, our billing company will begin calling patients after three statements have been sent out without payment to collect that payment for medical services already rendered. We are always willing to set up a payment plan for any amount. Unfortunately some patients do expect to be able to remain current patients and receive medical services without payment thus we use resources such as the AMA and the AAFP Practice Management recommendations to assist us with how best to address these issues.

Again, we wish you all the best.

name: Mike Kennedy
text:
Almost no place really deserves a 5 because 5 = perfect and no one/place/thing is perfect. Nonetheless, they do take pretty darn good care of you at Innova. So I'll rate a 5 since a 4 would lead many people to believe they aren't as good as they are.

Like most doctors these days, barring a procedure that must be done by a physician one hardly ever seems the Doc herself (unless you pay a good chunk of change extra to be in a concierge med. group). But the Nurse Practitioners all seem to be good and knowledgable and caring. And, of course, you do get more face time with a NP than you would with an MD—and that's a good thing since healthcare is very nuanced. (Well/sick is decidedly NOT a binary thing.)

resp.text: Mr. Kennedy, thank you for your kind words and for considering the human interpretation factor in your subjective star rating - your comments remind us of several thoughtful engineers we know! We will never be perfect, but we do strive for continual improvement, and there is no end to opportunities for that in our evolving healthcare field.

name: The Mental Fit Chick
text: THIS OFFICE IS SO AWESOME AND IS FREAKING AMAZING!!  We schedule our initial visit because we need to find a new doctor and plus my husband had been under the weather and his lymph nodes were swollen! We found out he had Stage 4 cancer (in remission now) but they moved so quickly and checked on him and myself and Kelly Rodgers was an ANGEL! I am very thankful that we went to them because other doctors kept giving him antibiotics and were not really listening! They  FREAKING LISTEN to you! Through every step they were with us and stood in it and that means a lot to us!!! I feel like they're family and it means the WORLD to me!! I would HIGHLY recommend going to them!!! I even suffer from Migraines and when I scheduled a visit for that they had all the lights off in the room they took me to and that takes careful attention and amazing customer service! Office is extremely clean as well and no wait time! Kelly is AWESOME so if you need someone ask for her unless she is booked!! Thank you INNOVA, Dr. Uptagrafft and KELLY!!!!! YALL ARE THE REAL MVP'S.

name: Bradley Judd
text: Hands down the best primary care office I've seen. Their online user interface is spectacular and the staff are so friendly (even when you lie on the automated phone system lol). That's another great thing about this office. You don't have to call to make your first appt. It can all be done online and then THEY will call YOU. I was able to set up an appt the very next day. As for Kelly, the nurse practitioner who saw me, she was great! She listened to all my needs and my prescriptions were READY TO PICK UP at my pharmacy within an hour of leaving the office!

resp.text: Bradley thanks for sharing your experience with Innova!  Our goal is to be available to our patients when they need us and our patient portal and phone app make that possible!  We will be sure to share your kind words with Kelley as well.

resp.text: Thank you for your review Leslie.

name: Leah Moss
text:
I had gone to my physiotherapists a week prior and they had called Innova on my behalf, requesting they order a MRI. instead of calling me, Innova put a message on their internal private portal. I didn't get the message, as I never dreamed they wouldn't be in direct contact with me. So, nearly a week later, I get a same day appointment at Innova.  I walk in with a cane. They proceed to tell me they cannot do anything for me. I barely made it there and it's late in the day. I insist there must be sonething to do since I couldn't perform basic hygiene or walk.  So they sent in another and another staff member, as I explained myself over and over I became more agitated and more explicit about what I couldn't do as a result of the blindibg pain. They finally arranged a MRI that afternoon at close of day. I went.
I hear back next day that my hip is shot and that I need  hip replacement.The orthopaedic surgeon said the year plus old xrays were clearly indicative of hip replacement some time ago  One heels of this news,  then I find Innova has deemed me innapropriate to be their patient. They sent person after person to witness my behavior and to justify their getting rid of me, not as I thought, to find someone on their staff who understood me.
So, If you are in excruciating pain, or have pressing health issues for a primary care doctor to manage, I would not recommend Innova. They had been my doctor for months at the time of the incident. They had not consulted with specialists who were caring for me. Then at my most vulnerable, they threw me out. I'm  certain I would have been better off at the ER with some random tramua doctor than to go there and be treated / not treated as I was by them.
They rely on their portal, messaging, voicemails emails and texts. A bit hands off for me anyway, that was a contributor to my missed communication and frustration, and prolonged pain. Good that it wasn't a life or death situation.

resp.text: Leah, I most sincerely regret that in your time of pain and need for medical care that despite our best intentions you did not feel you were receiving that from us.  Out of respect for your privacy and following HIPAA law regarding your personal health information we will not, on a public site, recount the documented details of your personal health events that you describe and certainly cannot speak for the communication process followed by other offices.  I regret that my personal conversation via phone with you the day following your MRI explaining our next course of action and treatment plan for your pain left you with the feeling that we are “hands off” as you described.    We do have certain policies that we follow at Innova such as responding by portal rather than a phone call when patients initiate communication to us via the portal.  In addition, out of respect for my Innova team, whom I regard as family, I do not allow patients to continue to receive care from us who use profane language towards my team in the public areas of our office creating a disturbance for our other patients that include children.  I sincerely hope that you find a new medical home with which you are more satisfied.  –Dr. Brooke

name: Wanda Spickard
text: Great Family Care.  Staff wonderful.  Dr and Nurse Practioners are great!

resp.text: Thank you for your positive feedback and your kind words about our healthcare providers!

name: paw waw
text: I've been going to Innova primary care for almost 3 years now. Back when Dr. Uptagrafft was in with Gleneagles. What I love most about this place is that if you have any concerns, they address them right away. For instance I was worried about my thyroid. When Dr. Uptagrafft asked if I had anything I would like her to check out, she didn't hesitate to check into it. She ran tests and did an ultrasound and, sure enough my thyroid was enlarged and, my levels were off. I eventually had to have my thyroid removed. I've heard many people have gone years with undiagnosed thyroid issues because, their doctors were so quick to dismiss the issue as something else without testing the levels or doing an ultrasound to rule it out. At innova they listen to your concerns and, they do what they can to get to the bottom of any issues you may have. They're kind, and they take time to answer any questions you may have without making you feel like you're wasting their time. I recommend this place to anyone looking for a primary care physician.

resp.text: Cortney, thanks so much for sharing your experience with us! At Innova, our providers and staff take the time to build a trusted relationship with you and discuss any concerns you may have regarding your health.  We will make sure to share your kind words with Dr. Uptagrafft!  We look forward to continuing to serve you in the future!
